獴字的基本解释

獴
méng
m噉g
哺乳动物的一属，头小，吻尖，身体长，脚短，耳朵小。捕食蛇、鱼、鼠、蟹等。

獴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［měng］
哺乳类动物。身长，脚短，头小，吻尖，耳小。捕食鼠、蛇、鱼、蛙、蟹等动物。我国产的有蟹獴、蛇獴和赤颊獴。

獴字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獴； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页720第22
【正字通】與蒙通。蒙貴。詳前?字註。

暂无。

Mongoose
Basic explanation of words
Mongoose
méng
m g
A genus of mammals with a small head, pointed snout, long body, short feet, and small ears. Prey on snakes, fish, rats, crabs, etc.
Mongoose
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [měng]
Mammals. Length, short feet, small head, pointed kiss, small ears. Prey on animals such as rats, snakes, fish, frogs, and crabs. China produces crab mongoose, snake mongoose and red-cheeked mongoose.
Mongoose
